description: Rain means both Manchester Originals against London Spirit and Birmingham Phoenix against Trent Rockets in the Hundred men's competition are abandoned.
title: The Hundred 2023: Originals-Spirit and Phoenix-Rockets men's matches rained off
title_page: The Hundred 2023: Originals-Spirit and Phoenix-Rockets men's matches rained off - BBC Sport
maintext:
The Hundred fixture between Manchester Originals and London Spirit in the men's competition was abandoned because of rain at Old Trafford.
The second men's fixture of the day between Birmingham Phoenix and Trent Rockets was then abandoned without a ball being bowled.
The first match had been reduced to 90 balls a side after an earlier delay.
But it was ultimately abandoned just 80 balls into Originals' innings, who finished 138-5.
England white-ball captain Jos Buttler smashed 62 from 36 balls, while Ravi Bopara took 2-13 for Spirit, whose fielders struggled with wet conditions.
Buttler smashed five sixes and three fours in his knock and was supported by Phil Salt's 21 from just nine balls, which looked to be setting a solid platform for the Originals before Spirit's bowlers fought back, led by Bopara, who bowled Buttler with a canny slower ball.
